text: vanattilum, pumiyilum avarkalukku munnalullataiyum avarkalukkup pinnalullataiyum avarkal parkka villaiya? Nam natinal avarkalai pumiyinul coruki vituvom; allatu vanattiliruntu avarkal mitu oru tuntai vilacceytu (avarkalai alittu) vituvom; (allahvaiye) munnokki nirkum ovvor atiyanukkum niccayamaka itil or attatci irukkiratu
